homeNotLogin.title: The Study Management Service for 2-2 Student
homeNotLogin.description: Page Two is school management service. This service is only used by Neulpuleun Middleschool student. So, if you are attending on Neulpuleun Middleschool, click below button to signup or signin and enjoy this service.

home.title: The Study Management Service for 2-2 Student
home.description: Page Two is school management service. If you want to check assignment of school test, watch below cards to check!

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.description: This process is for check if you are attending Neulpuleun Middleschool or not. If you have an Account? Login!

signin.title: Sign In
signin.description: If you sign in here, you can enjoy this service. If you don't have an Account? Create an Account first!

home.title: Assignment Information
home.description: Here, you can see information of school test

new.title: Create a New Assignment for 2-2 Students
new.description: You can create a new assignment here. The more detailed the content, the better.

home.title: Subject Information
home.description: Here, you can see information of school subject

home.title: Class Information
home.description: Here, you can see information of school class
